page.title: 10Public sevices
page.content: Dulas taxi hire started in 1981 altogether they employ 12 people and have 4 cars and 2 mini-buses. Dulas driving school started in 1980.They have 5 cars which are all minis.All their drivers are fully qualified.They cover the area from Rhyl to Conway.The driving school is highly recommended. Crosville buses have about 30 services both ways every day through Llanddulas with a very good service to Colwyn Bay.In summer time with traffic jams buses run sometimes more than an hour late,which annoys many people.National Express have 3 coaches each day from Llanddulas.These destinations are Manchester,Liverpool and London. Despite residents strongly protesting about the refuse tip,it was granted on 9th February 1984 for Powell Duffryn quarry for use for 60-90 years.
